text: The Boundary () is a 2014 Chinese suspense action crime drama film directed by Wang Tao. It was released on November 6. ==Cast== *Liu Ye *Vincent Zhao *Choo Ja-hyun *Guli Nazha *Xue Haowen *Chan Hwi *Marc Ma *Wu Peirou ==Reception== By November 7, the film had earned ¥13.10 million at the Chinese box office. ==References== Category:Chinese crime drama films Category:Chinese suspense films Category:Chinese films
title: The Boundary (2014 film)
